Activity: Log in, check emails, and review the week's progress on modeling tasks.
Prepare to present the final character model and environment assets to the team.
Break - Relax and mentally prepare for the presentation.
Present the main character and environment assets to the team, gather final feedback.
Discuss the next steps based on feedback from the presentation with the team.
Document all feedback and create an adjusted plan for the following week.
Check emails and follow up with any team members regarding outstanding tasks.
Wrap up, ensure all work is saved, and plan for leisure activities over the weekend.
